hasAttributes.name: approvedBy
hasAttributes.description: User ID (from User_Listing file) for person who approved the entry.

hasAttributes.name: approvedByDate
hasAttributes.description: Date the entry was approved.

hasAttributes.name: businessUnitCode
hasAttributes.description: Used to identify the business unit, region, branch, and so on at the level that financial statements are being audited and for which the trial balance is generated. For example, you may use a code aligned with the concept of a reportable segment as defined in FASB Accounting Standards Codification (ASC) 280, Segment Reporting.

hasAttributes.name: enteredBy
hasAttributes.description: User_ID (from User_Listing file) for person who created the record.

hasAttributes.name: enteredDateTime
hasAttributes.description: The date the transaction was entered into the  system. This is sometimes referred to as the  creation date. This should be a system- generated date (rather than user-entered  date), when possible. This date does not  necessarily correspond with the date of the  transaction itself.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetId
hasAttributes.description: ID associated with fixed asset

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetRealizedGainLossAccount
hasAttributes.description: Account to which realised gains or losses on Assets is posted in the GL

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetRealizedGainLossAmount
hasAttributes.description: Amount of realised gain or loss on the fixed asset disposal

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetUnrealizedGainLossAccount
hasAttributes.description: Account to which unrealised gains or losses is posted in the GL

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetUnrealizedGainLossAmount
hasAttributes.description: Amount of change in value of asset not yet realised

hasAttributes.name: glAccount
hasAttributes.description: Name of GL Account on which value change of asset has been posted

hasAttributes.name: glTransactionId
hasAttributes.description: Transaction ID in the GL for recognising revaluation on asset

hasAttributes.name: lastModifiedBy
hasAttributes.description: User_ID (from User_Listing file) for the last person modifying this entry.

hasAttributes.name: lastModifiedByDate
hasAttributes.description: Modifying Date  of the last person modifying the Fixed asset valuation entry.

hasAttributes.name: lotNumber
hasAttributes.description: identification number assigned to a particular quantity or lot of material or depending on the asset classified

hasAttributes.name: revaluationAmount
hasAttributes.description: change in the value of asset

hasAttributes.name: revaluationDate
hasAttributes.description: Date on which the revaluation took place or became effective

hasAttributes.name: revaluationDescription
hasAttributes.description: Description of reason for or approach to revaluation

hasAttributes.name: segment01
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for  profit center, division, fund, program, branch, project, and so on.

hasAttributes.name: segment02
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for  profit center, division, fund, program, branch, project, and so on.

hasAttributes.name: segment03
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for  profit center, division, fund, program, branch, project, and so on.

hasAttributes.name: segment04
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for  profit center, division, fund, program, branch, project, and so on.

hasAttributes.name: segment05
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for  profit center, division, fund, program, branch, project, and so on.

hasAttributes.name: serialNumber
hasAttributes.description: serial number for asset, used by manufacturer for identification

hasAttributes.name: uniqueId
hasAttributes.description: ID associated with Valuation made to the fixed asset

hasAttributes.name: valuerDocumentReference
hasAttributes.description: Reference of the documentary evidence for revaluation, e.g. valuation report reference number or similar

hasAttributes.name: valuerId
hasAttributes.description: ID of the individual or organisation performing the revaluation

hasAttributes.name: valuerName
hasAttributes.description: Name of the individual or organisation performing the revaluation

hasAttributes.name: revalMethod
hasAttributes.description: Code or name for method used for revaluation.

hasAttributes.name: maxFullyRevdEvals
hasAttributes.description: Default value of the maximum number of revaluations allowed on a fully reserved asset.

hasAttributes.name: priorLifeInMonths
hasAttributes.description: Life of an asset in months before revaluation.

hasAttributes.name: lifeInMonths
hasAttributes.description: Life of an asset in months after revaluation.
